Room.Name: Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Taragon Road, just on the west side of the militia barracks.
Room.LongDescription: Looking south, you can see the eastern village gate and the intersection with Caledonia Way. To the north are the village's storage barns and silos. The surrounding farms keep Brownhaven well supplied with food, and in the event of a long-term siege the village could probably hold out for several years. Of course, that's not likely, but its best to be prepared.
